review: We've had the Fire TV Stick hooked up for about a week now, and so far so good. It took me less than 5 minutes to set it up and begin streaming. I added Netflix since a lot of the films I wanted to watch on Prime were either not available or an additional charge. Between Netflix and Amazon, I spent way too much time this week watching movies and rewatching my old favorite TV shows (Jericho marathon! :-) ). It would be perfect if it didn't require an outlet, but overall we're pleased with the Fire Stick.
author: Elizabeth DeRenzo
